feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Coastal Flood Warning issued September 19 at 3:49PM AKDT until September 20 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor Coastal Flooding. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could see minor flooding. High surf will occur and significant erosion is expected.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:38PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow Above 3000 Feet Late Tonight Into Tuesday... Snow is expected to develop late tonight above 3000 feet and continue into Tuesday. Up to 3 inches is possible in Atigun Pass. with lesser amounts just below pass level.

entry.summary: ...Windy with Blowing Snow Above 3000 Feet Late Tonight Into Tuesday... Southwest winds gusting to 40 mph are expected to develop above 3000 ft late tonight and continue into Tuesday. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:38PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow Above 3000 Feet Late Tonight Into Tuesday... Snow is expected to develop late tonight above 3000 feet and continue into early Tuesday. Up to 3 inches of snow is possible above 3000 ft.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:38PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Significant Snowfall Above 3000 feet Tuesday Into Wednesday... Snow is expected to develop above 3000 feet early on Tuesday and continue into Wednesday. Up to 6 inches of snow is possible above 3000 ft.
